text: DYNZ-DTV, Channel 20, is a commercial digital television station of Philippine television network A2Z, owned by ZOE Broadcasting Network and operated under blocktime agreement by ABS-CBN Corporation. Its transmitter and master control are located at Mt. Busay, Babag 1, Cebu City. ==Upcoming programs== * Balitang A2Z Central Visayas * Ulat A2Z Central Visayas ==Digital television== ===Digital channels=== UHF Channel 20 (509.143 MHz) Channel Video Aspect Short name Programming Notes 20.01 480i 4:3 A2Z A2Z Commercial test broadcast (5.5 kW) 20.02 480i 16:9 Light TV Light TV 20.22 240p 4:3 A2Z oneseg A2Z 1seg broadcast == Areas of coverage == === Primary areas === * Cebu City ==== Secondary areas ==== * Portion of Cebu Province * Portion of Bohol * Portion of Leyte * Portion of Negros Oriental ==Related pages== * ZOE Broadcasting Network * Light TV * A2Z ==References== Category:2022 establishments in the Philippines Category:Filipino television stations
title: DYNZ-DTV
